org.gannacademy.cdf.turtlelogo

Class Track

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gannacademy.cdf.turtlelogo.Track

  • public class Track
extends java.lang.Object
    Turtles make visible tracks in terraria (by dragging their pens, of course)
    Author:
    Seth Battis

    • Constructor Detail

      • Track

        public Track(double x1,
             double y1,
             double x2,
             double y2,
             java.awt.Color color,
             java.awt.Stroke stroke,
             Turtle.UnderTheShell key)

        Construct a new track segment

        May only be called by Turtle and its subclasses, enforced via Turtle.UnderTheShell.

        Parameters:
        x1 - coordinate of start
        y1 - coordinate of start
        x2 - coordinate of end
        y2 - coordinate of end
        color - of track
        stroke - style of track
        key - to authenticate "Turtleness"

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D context,
                 Terrarium.UnderTheSurface key)

        Draw the track in the terrarium

        May only be called by Terrarium and its subclasses, enforced via Terrarium.UnderTheSurface.

        Parameters:
        context - for drawing commands
        key - to authenticate "Terrarium-iality"
